species.name: volcanion
descriptions: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.
It lets out billows of steam and disappears into the dense fog. Itâ€™s said to live in mountains where humans do not tread.

abilities.effect: Absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.
